Hi Rob

I get my Japanese Publications now direst from Japan. There is a Japanese Amazon but frightning for non Japanese readers!!
They must be well into the seventies now with their "red series" but there are many more similar works of interest... and as I always say ".. the pictures are in English!!".

I have also obtained several of the volumes from the Japanese Publications Centre - I am not upto date regardng the location of it at present but there was a shop near St Paul's Cathedral (the one in Warwick St in central London closed) - There was also a large shop inthe Japanese Retail outlet Centre (forgot the name , sorry!!) on Edgware Road. I haven't looked on the Net so there is that to try and also good old BT Directory Enq..

Sorry have not been in touch... things have been more than busy!!

                                Rod
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rob Broom 
  To: 'samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com' 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 26, 2003 12:44 PM
  Subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Digest Number 449


  Any suggestions for getting hold of any of these infamous Nihon Gunzo
  Rekishi or copies, or a loan, I have asked various people but so far no
  luck.

  Any help appreciated.

  thanks and kind regards

  Rob
